DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal is to evaluate whether a home telehealth system that enables the participant to monitor their body weight, blood glucose values and blood pressure values, associated with remote educational support and feedback to the general practitioner, can improve metabolic control and overall cardiovascular risk in individuals with type 2 diabetes mellitus (T2DM), as compared to usual practice.
DOC.brief_title: Telemonitoring System Study in Participants With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus (MK-0000-347)
